question: Which among the following has been provided to the Scheduled Tribes and other Traditional Forest Dwellers through The Scheduled Tribes and other Traditional Forest Dwellers (Recognition of Forest Rights) Act 2006?
option2: Allocation of lands in places out side the forests
explanation: The Scheduled Tribes and other Traditional Forest Dwellers (Recognition of Forest Rights) Act 2006 provides the legal rights on forest land to the Scheduled Tribes and other Traditional Forest Dwellers.
